item.title: Calling for user-testing volunteers (Paris, France)
item.description: A lot of work has been done on the new back office for PrestaShop 1.7, most notably the reworked Product page and Modules page; as well as the brand new theme. Now, we need you to tell us what you think â€“ face to face! As a reminder, the PrestaShop 1.7 Project FAQ is available.
